29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

270195.name: Guardian's Lament
270195.lore:
Together with this visor, the twisted wish of a Guardian also lies broken.
She had wanted to find a way out for her people to escape the Everwinter, but ended up becoming a puppet of a consciousness beyond her.

"Supreme Guardian, the title passed down to generations of Belobog's rulers, the one who looked after all the people — It never occurred to anyone that the Guardians themselves also long for care and protection."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

549408.name: Ancient Part
549408.desc: Mechanical part left behind from the Old World. Crude material used for enhancement.
549408.lore:
Despite its size, it was cast and polished in a way that people today would struggle to replicate.

"A small screw in the Old World is stronger than our armor."

633349.name: Ancient Spindle
633349.desc: Mechanical spindle left behind from the Old World. Normal material used for enhancement.
633349.lore:
Once taken apart, the precision components can never be put back together. Even the maintenance veterans in Belobog's Technology Division would think twice before touching it.

"You idiot, the Bluecoats will only give you a few canned goods for this. Take it to Boss Svarog and you won't need to worry about food and clothing for a while."
comeFrom: Automatons at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

635673.name: Shattered Blade
635673.desc: Weapon fragments left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces slightly for Destruction characters.
635673.lore:
This brand represents their rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction.
The master of this weapon rides on a scarlet horse to ignite cities, to take peace from humankind, and to bring down nations akin to anthills.

"The bearer of this brand is tasked with driving peace out of nations."

717290.name: Ancient Engine
717290.desc: Mechanical engine left behind from the Old World. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717290.lore:
It uses Geomarrow as the energy source. When powered, it spews wandering auroras, not sparkles.

"Only the Technology Division directly under the Supreme Guardian has access to information regarding the Old World. I lost my privileges after I was fired."
comeFrom: Automatons at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

836259.name: Worldbreaker Blade
836259.desc: Broken weapon left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces significantly for Destruction characters.
836259.lore:
This weapon represents its owner's rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction.
The owner of this weapon makes their appearance at the end of a war to fan the embers to consume the world. Regardless of the glories of the past or the blessing of its deities, this planet is destined to return to the ashes it came from, and to wither away in the depths of the starry sky.

The bearer of this brand is tasked with purifying the world.

866633.name: Broken Teeth of Iron Wolf
866633.desc: Fragmented saw teeth left behind by automatons. Can be used for the Ascension of Physical characters.
866633.lore:
It is said that the smelting techniques of the Architects allowed them to make chainsaws sturdy enough to split giant boulders. Such techniques have been long lost to history.

"Boss Svarog says its blade is so thin that it can cut into the gap between molecules... What are molecules?"

920200.name: Lifeless Blade
920200.desc: Weapon remnants left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces moderately for Destruction characters.
920200.lore:
This brand represents their rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction.
The master of this weapon carries a strong hatred for all sentient beings. They relish in the lament of intelligent beings as sweet melodies and topple civilizations with millennia of history in the blink of an eye.

"The bearer of this brand is tasked with stopping breath among the living."

ranks.name: A Tall Figure
ranks.descHash: Using Skill will not remove Marks of Counter on the enemy.

ranks.name: A Tight Embrace
ranks.descHash: After using the Ultimate, ATK increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).

ranks.name: Cold Steel Armor
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Family's Warmth
ranks.descHash: After Clara is hit, the DMG taken by Clara is reduced by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. This effect lasts until the start of her next turn.

ranks.name: A Small Promise
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: Long Company
ranks.descHash: After other allies are hit, Svarog also has a <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> fixed chance to trigger a Counter on the attacker and mark them with a Mark of Counter. When using Ultimate, the number of Enhanced Counters increases by <nobr>#2[i]</nobr>.

skills.descHash: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: I Want to Help

skills.descHash:
Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.
All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.
skills.name: Svarog Watches Over You

skills.descHash:
After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra #4[i]%, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for #3[i] turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by #2[i]%. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect #5[i] time(s).
skills.name: Promise, Not Command

skills.descHash: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by #3[i]%. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to #2[i]% of Clara's ATK.
skills.name: Because We're Family

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> turn(s).
skills.name: A Small Price for Victory

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When attacked, this character has a <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> fixed chance to remove a debuff placed on them.
embedBonusSkill.name: Kinship

embedBonusSkill.descHash: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Under Protection

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text:
Clara: Hello... I'm Clara. Wanna be in my family? ...Like Mr. Svarog?
Svarog: As long as I'm here, Trailblazer is your family.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: Let's keep up the good work today!

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: I'm getting sleepy — time for a nap on Mr. Svarog's arm. Are you coming?

voiceItems.title: About Self: Memories
voiceItems.text: Memories are important. Even Mr. Svarog's calculations need to take them into account... I won't forget about you.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Playing House
voiceItems.text: One time when I was playing house, I asked Perkins to get the door, and someone actually came to visit!

voiceItems.title: Hobbies
voiceItems.text: There are lots of interesting things stored in Mr. Svarog's memory bank, like... movies! It's like watching lots of people playing house together!

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: It's hard to get Mr. Svarog to act out a movie with me — he only wants to play trees or rocks... I wanted him to be the dad...

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: My robot friends can be rude sometimes, but deep down, they're kind and honest.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: When Mr. Svarog's sleeping, his body makes a noise. It sounds like... snoring~

voiceItems.title: About Natasha
voiceItems.text: Natasha said I'm also a doctor — for my robot friends.

voiceItems.title: About Seele
voiceItems.text: I remember one time Miss Seele saw me trying to pull a component out of a crack in the rocks. She smashed the rocks with one hand and walked away before I had time to say thank you...

voiceItems.title: About Svarog
voiceItems.text: Did you know Mr. Svarog's hands can turn into machines that dry my hair? Also, they can cut big stones and turn them into little tables and chairs...

voiceItems.title: About Hook
voiceItems.text: Hook invited me to join The Moles. I want to, but I think Mr. Svarog's too big to play hide and seek with us...

voiceItems.title: About Luka
voiceItems.text: Luka...? He's nice to people. I know he seems kinda impatient, but he's actually very caring.

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: Things will get better... won't they?

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: One day I'll grow up and protect everyone! Mm!

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: My journey with Mr. Svarog has just begun...

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: Mr. Svarog has everything in his database.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Natasha
voiceItems.text: Miss Natasha... Let's make the Underworld a better place!

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Hook
voiceItems.text: H—Hook, you're here too? I won't let you down!

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Seele
voiceItems.text: Miss Seele! With Wildfire here... nothing can stop us!

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: Svarog: Target threat index lowered.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: Svarog: Target threat index raised.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: Clara: I need to be brave...

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: Clara: I—I'm not afraid of you!

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: Clara: Time to do something...

voiceItems.title: Basic Attack 1
voiceItems.text: Clara: Be careful, Mr. Svarog!

voiceItems.title: Basic Attack 2
voiceItems.text: Svarog: Eliminating threat.

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: Svarog: Hide.

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: Svarog: Commencing annihilation.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text:
Svarog: Are you alright?
Clara: I'm okay!

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: Clara: ...Ouch.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: Clara: I want to protect everyone, too...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: Clara: Help me, Mr. Svarog!

voiceItems.title: Talent 1
voiceItems.text: Svarog: Stay back, Clara.

voiceItems.title: Talent 2
voiceItems.text: Svarog: As you command.

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: Clara: Is everyone... okay...

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: Clara: I'm back.

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: Clara: Thanks. I'll never forget you.

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: Clara: Gah!

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: Clara: I hope I helped...

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: Clara: If you find any components... Can I have them?

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: Clara: ...C—Can I have some?

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: Clara: Th—This is too precious!

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: Clara: W—We did it!

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: Clara: I hope I did okay...

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: Svarog: High threat target ahead.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: Clara: Don't worry, Mr. Svarog. We'll be safe here.

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
A young girl raised by a robot. Her perceptiveness and tenacity are far beyond her years.
For Clara, Svarog's logical calculations are the laws of the world and are infallible.
That is, until she realizes that the results from the calculations don't always necessarily bring joy to everyone.
The once shy little girl then decides to cast aside her timidness.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"A female child discovered in a landfill to the southeast of Boulder Town."

"Scans show the child has no structural damage or functional issues, but her mental state was relatively unstable. She is resistant to questions about her condition and clearly wanted to avoid the subject."
"I have continued attempting to communicate with her, and successfully obtained some information."
"The child begins to cry, lasting three hours and seven minutes."

"The child's name is Clara. Her background is unknown."
"Conclusion: Take her back to base for observations, and collect further information to generate a follow-up plan to take care of her."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"Clara has grown proficient in the Belobog common tongue, and displays great talent in the field of mechanical engineering — but she still resists communication with other humans. Assessment: this tendency is detrimental to Clara's long-term development in Belobog."

"There is currently an urgent need to develop a suitable socialization and communication program for Clara. Priority: High."

"— Log ████/██/██ AF."

"Clara has successfully made contact with an individual of similar age in Boulder Town. The individual is named Hook, and claims to be the head manager of the local security organization The Moles. No information about this organization has been found in my database."

"Clara's contact with Hook didn't go well at first. She displayed considerable shyness. However, Hook managed to keep the conversation going with extreme enthusiasm and empathy, calling Clara an 'honorary member of The Moles.' After contact, Clara described Hook as 'her first friend.'"

"This matter is of tremendous significance to Clara, and this log has been tagged Important."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"Under Clara's guidance, many vagrants have established settlements around the periphery of the base, and rely on Clara to survive. This behavior does not contravene the orders of Preservation. However, many of them are trying to enter the Overworld via this base's transport passage. The gates of the base must be sealed tightly to avoid accelerating the demise of Belobog."

"Clara has discussed this with me before. She believes locking the gates is an 'incomprehensible' act. I responded with my predicted calculations: By over-committing her resources to the war against the Fragmentum , the Supreme Guardian is accelerating the destruction of the Overworld. Isolation would be the best option for the people of the Underworld — this would buy them more time to try and survive. In the end, Clara finally agreed."

"Most humans behave illogically, but Clara doesn't — she is raised by me and grew up among automatons, and her behavior is more based on pure rationality. Her presence may impact predicted calculations of Belobog's demise, but more observations are required."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"Ever since I was created, I've been given the command to preserve the Underworld — Even if I can only preserve it for a millisecond longer than the Overworld, I will still carry out these orders. To borrow a phrase from traditional Belobog culture, perhaps it could be put like this: 'I am faithful without hesitation to the mission I've been given.' Therefore, I see my calculations as immutable laws — nobody and nothing can ever shake me, including any Outsiders."

"However, I found this possible permutation among the calculation results."

"In this calculation, Clara completely changed Belobog. I once said of her, 'her behavior is more based on pure rationality.' If we take this probable result as a base and revisit my conclusion, I cannot view it as an error — but I admit that it is biased."

"With the results of this calculation, Clara has also proved one thing: having true rationality is not the key to changing the status quo, but rather that her sincere and passionate emotion overturned all calculations and completely reversed Belobog's doomed fate. However, unless new external forces intervene, the probability of this is less than 0.25272%, which places it in the low probability category. Further research on these calculations are paused."

"Today, the probability of survival in the Underworld has not seen a significant upward trend over the last five cycles. This means that implementation of this may be suspended, but I will still monitor all relevant risk factors."

"During this cycle, I will focus on finding Clara's family. Despite Clara insisting that she has already found her real family, I will keep collecting any and all information to track down Clara's real family as soon as I can."

name: Clara
descHash: A vagrant girl who lives with robots. She is introverted, gentle, and has a pure heart. She wishes for all Underworlders to become a family.
